title: The Sims 2: Apartment Life Crack file.
description:
Instructions:

*Obviously you have to have Sims 2 installed first so go hunt for that.

**If you already have Sims 2 installed go to step 1.

1. Download The Sims 2: Apartment Life. LINK--> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent  /4363141/The.Sims.2.Apartment.Life-RELOADED

2.Once you have completely installed it and updated it to where it cant be updated any more. Go to the directory in which you installed it. By default it would be:
C:Program FilesEA GamesThe Sims 2 Apartment Life. You will open the folder named "TSBin". Once in that folder you will see a Sims icon named: "Sims2EP8".

3. Replace the original Sims2EP8 with the one you download from this torrent. When it asks if it is ok to overwrite click yes to all.

4. After it is done over writing click the Sims2EP8 and it will open without asking for the CD or anything. 


-Make a new shortcut on the desktop of the new Sims2EP8 file for easy access.

-Hope my instructions were helpful.

-Let me know how it worked out for you in the comments.
